projects.title: REST COUNTRIES
projects.description: Rest Countries is a web application designed to provide users with comprehensive information about countries worldwide. Leveraging a public API, the platform enables users to search for specific countries, browse through a list of all countries, and access detailed information about each country. Key features include country search functionality, a sortable country list, and detailed country profiles. The application is built using React.js for the frontend, with options for state management using React Context API or Redux, and styling with Tailwind Css. It is designed to be responsive and can be deployed using platforms like Vercel, Netlify, or GitHub Pages. Ultimately, Rest Countries aims to enhance users' understanding and appreciation of global diversity and culture.

projects.title: Monzo Demo Clone
projects.description: The Monzo Demo Clone for authentication screens is a simulated version of the authentication flow used in the Monzo banking application. It replicates the user interface and functionality of Monzo's login and registration screens for demonstration or educational purposes. This clone typically includes features such as email/username/password login, social media authentication (e.g., Google, Facebook), password recovery, and user registration. By mimicking the Monzo authentication process.

aboutpara: Ever since I can remember, my fascination with technology has been the driving force behind my journey.
